realm.name: kardex
realm.description: Adds a "kardex" role to the JWT to identify users/clients permitted to access Kardex endpoints

realm.name: bibliofil
realm.description: Adds a "bibliofil" role to the JWT to identify users/clients permitted to access material owned by Bibliofil

realm.name: order
realm.description: Adds an "order" role to the JWT to identify users/clients permitted to access order endpoints

realm.name: hermes-admin
realm.description: Adds a "hermes-admin" role to the JWT to identify users/clients permitted to access admin-only endpoints

realm.name: item
realm.description: Adds an "item" role to the JWT to identify users/clients permitted to access item endpoints

realm.name: asta
realm.description: Adds an "asta" role to the JWT to identify users/clients permitted to access material owned by Asta

realm.name: synq
realm.description: Adds a "synq" role to the JWT to identify users/clients permitted to access SynQ endpoints

realm.name: axiell
realm.description: Adds an "axiell" role to the JWT to identify users/clients permitted to access material owned by Axiell

clients.name: Asta (Local Client)
clients.description: A local development version of the client for Asta to use in communication with Hermes WLS

clients.name: Axiell (Local Client)
clients.description: A local development version of the client for Axiell to use in communication with Hermes WLS

clients.name: Bibliofil (Local Client)
clients.description: A local development version of the client for Bibliofil to use in communication with Hermes WLS

clients.name: Hermes Admin (Local Client)
clients.description: A local development version of the admin client used to access admin-only endpoints in Hermes WLS

clients.name: Hermes Dashboard (Local Client)
clients.description: A local version of the client used by the Hermes Dashboard app to authenticate users

clients.name: Kardex (Local Client)
clients.description: A local development version of the client for Kardex to use in communication with Hermes WLS

clients.name: SynQ (Local Client)
clients.description: A local development version of the client for SynQ to use in communication with Hermes WLS

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: wls-audience
clientScopes.description: Adds WLS to the audience (aud) array in JWT, in order to identify WLS as intended recipient of the token

clientScopes.name: wls-subject
clientScopes.description: Adds client ID to the subject (sub) field in JWT, in order to identify the client as subject of the token

authenticationFlows.description: Method with which to verity the existing account
Flow to determine if the OTP is required for the authentication
Flow to determine if the OTP is required for the authentication
Flow to determine if the OTP is required for the authentication
Handle what to do if there is existing account with same email/username like authenticated identity provider
Flow to determine if the OTP should be reset or not. Set to REQUIRED to force.
Flow for the existing/non-existing user alternatives
Used by Docker clients to authenticate against the IDP
Actions taken after first broker login with identity provider account, which is not yet linked to any Keycloak account
Username, password, otp and other auth forms.
Reset credentials for a user if they forgot their password or something
